viscera-weight.description: Gut weight of abalone (after bleeding) (in grams)

shell-weight.description: Weight of abalone after being dried (in grams)

sex_F.description: Abalone is female (1 if true, 0 otherwise)

sex_I.description: Abalone is infant (1 if true, 0 otherwise)

sex_M.description: Abalone is male (1 if true, 0 otherwise)

rings.description: Number of rings in abalone (indicating age)

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in marine biology.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the abalone, please predict the number of rings.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in marine biology.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the abalone, please predict the length.
prompt.answer_prompt: The length of the abalone is {length}.
